BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
 
 Plotting predictions made with a DeepState model fails.
 The same plotting code works with a SimpleFeedForwardEstimator.
 <denchmark-h:h2>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
 
 Please see the attached file
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/awslabs/gluon-ts/files/3647682/benchmark_m4.py.txt>benchmark_m4.py.txt</denchmark-link>
 
 It is based on examples/benchmark_m4.py.
 <denchmark-h:h2>Error Message</denchmark-h>
 
 Length of passed values is 1, index implies 48
 <denchmark-h:h2>Environment</denchmark-h>
 
 Ubuntu 16.04
 conda 4.7.10
 Python 3.7.4
 $ pip list | egrep 'gluon|mxnet'
 gluonts 0.3.4.dev22+g515c45c /home/matus/src/gluon-ts/src
 mxnet-cu101mkl 1.4.1
 $ git log | head -n 1
 commit <denchmark-link:https://github.com/awslabs/gluon-ts/commit/29ab758c9ddebdbba39a12597a1d5fcaaf906a97>29ab758</denchmark-link>

comments_0.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/awslabs/gluon-ts/pull/340>#340</denchmark-link>
  should solve this, let me know if this works and feel free to reopen if it doesn't

comments_1.comment_text:
Plotting works with <denchmark-link:https://github.com/awslabs/gluon-ts/pull/340>#340</denchmark-link>
 , thanks for the fix!
